name: Lyudochka Snezhevna
desc: A former Fatuus who started a new life in Inazuma.

customize.name: Fatui
customize.desc: A Snezhnayan organization that is loyal to the Tsaritsa and has spread out all over the continent. Its Harbingers are on the hunt for the Gnoses.

customize.text: Lyudochka was a Fatui spy sent to
. With the Traveler's help, she faked her death and started a new life in the Grand Narukami Shrine.
Lyudochka's friend, with whom she grew up in the House of the Hearth.

customize.name: Gendou Ringo
customize.desc: A shrine maiden from the Grand Narukami Shrine.

customize.text: Lyudochka's new identity as a shrine maiden. Previously, this role was played by the Shuumatsuban agent,

customize.name: Chitose
customize.desc: A code name of a Shuumatsuban agent, also known as Momoyo.

customize.name: Lyudochka's Fortune Slip
customize.desc:
A specially made fortune slip that describes how your luck will be like today. There is nothing different about this Fortune Slip, save for the fact that you used it to open Lyudochka's heart.
Now, this Fortune Slip has returned to your hands, along with her heartfelt blessings. If you've got the time, why not go to the Grand Narukami Shrine to see her?

customize.name: Lyudochka's Mora Purse
customize.desc: The Mora purse that Lyudochka left behind. It contains a decent sum of Mora, but even Paimon doesn't want to use it.

customize.name: Lyudochka's Letter
customize.desc:
The letter that Lyudochka asked someone from Yae Publishing House to pass on to you. It contains her reasons for leaving without saying why. However, whether you will accept her reasons for departing or not is a different story.
It was you who discovered her presence and changed her fate... Might you be able to do still more to change this ending for the better?
